description: Wolf Hudson rides his motorcycle in the middle of the night. He drives through the industrial part of town and sees a strange man tied up on the side of the road. Dominik Rider is hooded, tied, and in some sort of daze. Wolf stops to help, but he's frustrated by Dominik's lack of response. Wolf tries to call for help, but gets distracted by Dominik's hard cock. Wolf senses something isn't right when he finds strange leather toys, and he suddenly feels compelled to abuse Dominik. Wolf ties him up on the scaffolding and gives him an intense flogging. He fucks Dominik's head, then his ass, and then drives off into the night.
title: The Motorist
